mapper.insert: insert into call_history (user_phone, cp_phone, cp_name, cp_address, call_date, cp_div) values (#{user_phone}, #{cp_phone}, #{cp_name},#{cp_address}, sysdate(), #{cp_div})
mapper.select: select * from call_history where user_phone = #{userPhone} and call_date >= date_add(now(), interval - 12 month) order by call_date desc
